better once this<NEXT>pirate scare's over
and done with...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>What was it Miss

get again...?<NEXT>She'll be angry

a mistake...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Be nice if I could

in business sale!<NEXT>Why don't you take
a look around?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I can't remember
what it was I was
supposed to get...<NEXT>Miss Tron's gonna
be so angry...
boo hoo![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Well, done some
window shopping...<NEXT>Guess it's time
to go home![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x96],2[0x88]f[0x0]b[0x0][0x12]3[0x8f][0x0]8"Huh? Someone
carrying a bag?
Yeah, I saw him!<NEXT>He said he had lots
of money, so I
tried to get him to<NEXT>buy something, but
he didn't buy
anything!<NEXT>He said that it
wasn't his money
to spend...<NEXT>He left saying he
was going to get
something to eat...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98] 2 [0xff][0x88]f[0x0][0xa2][0x0][0x12]3[0x8f][0x0]8"All the excitement

calmed down now...<NEXT>Guess I'll have

again...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I came here to buy
a hair curler,<NEXT>'cause I want to
make sure I always
look my best!<NEXT>Speaking of good-
looking, my
brother's<NEXT>spending all his
time at the
tailor's...<NEXT>Hate to admit it,<NEXT>but his fashion
sense is better
than mine![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98] 2 [0xff]<DIALOG2>Business has been
pretty good lately.[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I hear something

the Main Gate...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>I came looking for
a flashlight...<NEXT>Never know when
something might
happen and<NEXT>you'll need

bulb for my
flashlight...<NEXT>Now that I've
got one, I'll be
able to evacuate<NEXT>with everyone
else...But maybe
I won't have to...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x98]x[0x0]N[0xff][0x88]r[0x0]P[0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8"Haven't seen you
around here
before...<NEXT>Hey, wait a minute!<NEXT>Are you one of
those...what are
they called?<NEXT>Are you a Digger!?<NEXT>[0x88][0x6e][0x0][0xa0][0x0]81[0x8f][0x0]8[0x86][0x0][0x0][0x9c]6[0x0][0x92]1[0x0][0xe9]Yes [0x92]1[0x11][0xe9]No[0x86]1[0x0][0x93][0x80]IJ[0xa5][0x80][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0]P[0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8"I thought so!<NEXT>Seems everyone

youngest Digger
I've seen yet![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0][0x88]r[0x0]P[0x0].3[0x8f][0x0]8"No? Really? Oh,
well...I thought
maybe you were<NEXT>'cause of that
funny outfit you've
got on, but...[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Say, you're a
Digger, aren't you?<NEXT>Then you must know
about pirates,
right?<NEXT>[0x88][0x6e][0x0][0xa0][0x0]81[0x8f][0x0]8[0x86][0x0][0x0][0x9c]6[0x0][0x92]1[0x0][0xe9]Yes [0x92]1[0x11][0xe9]No[0x86]1[0x0][0x93][0x80]LM[0xa5][0x80][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>My!
But you don't
associate with<NEXT>people like that,
do you?[0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>No?
Well, pirates are
Diggers who are<NEXT>only interested in
one thing-making
a profit--<NEXT>and they don't care
what they have to
do to get it!<NEXT>They're a real bad
bunch of people...<NEXT>I hope we never
have to worry about
pirates here![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Oh, it's you
again...Did you
hear the news<NEXT>about the pirate
threat?<NEXT>[0x88][0x6e][0x0][0xa0][0x0]81[0x8f][0x0]8[0x86][0x0][0x0][0x9c]6[0x0][0x92]1[0x0][0xe9]Yes [0x92]1[0x11][0xe9]No[0x86]1[0x0][0x93][0x80]OP[0xa5][0x80][0x0][0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>You have? Then
it must be true!<NEXT>We'd better get
out of here, then![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]<DIALOG2>Really? It must not
be true then...
Whew![0x9b][0xa5][0x80]4[0x0][0x0][0x0]
